body:
"ITS YOUR FAULT"

"ITS MY FAULT??"

Proceeds to get NTRed
Love the way these characters are drawn.

Yeah, there just wasn't much of an introduction of ntr. I also think it's because the husband only appears at the end, before that you don't get the image that she was happily married and in love with her husband, for the guy to then come in and steal her away and destroy that image.
Weird this was pretty much NTR yet I don't have the feeling of NTR. Perhaps because we had the perspective of the netori? or the netorare didn't show up until the last page... I'm rather confused.
